BALTIMORE -- The Jonas Brothers are stopping in Baltimore for a secret show next week, a Live Nation announced Tuesday. 
The band is playing three shows next week: in Los Angeles on April 25, Dallas… [+876 chars]

articles.title: BTS star J-Hope joins South Korean army - Associated Press
articles.description: (18 Apr 2023) J-Hope becomes 2nd BTS member to join South Korean army. (April 18)Subscribe for more Breaking News: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress Website...
